title: Graves, why is he the way he is?
body:
And why do we have to suffer through months of ranked when he does too much too well?

Running around as a jungler with a full damage build but still enjoying 150 armor in combat. 

Wonderful. 

I am so tired of Riot screwing up and leaving it like that for months. As soon as we have 10 bans graves will probably be banned most matches.

So annoying.
